煌々: (こうこう) - brilliant; dazzling; light; bright
煌く: (きらめく) - to glitter; to glisten; to sparkle; to twinkle; to glare; to gleam
煌びやか: (きらびやか) - gorgeous; gaudy; dazzling; gay; resplendent
煌めき: (キラメキ) - glitter; glimmer; sparkle; twinkle
煌めく: (きらめく) - to glitter; to glisten; to sparkle; to twinkle; to glare; to gleam
煌煌: (こうこう) - brilliant; dazzling; light; bright
煎じる: (せんじる) - to boil; to decoct; to infuse
煎じ出す: (せんじだす) - to extract by broiling; to prepare an infusion of; to decoct
煎じ詰める: (せんじつめる) - to boil down; to condense
煎じ詰めると: (せんじつめると) - after all; in the end; in short
煎ずる: (せんずる) - to boil; to decoct; to infuse
煎りつく: (いりつく) - to be scorched; to boil down
煎りつける: (いりつける) - to parch; to roast; to broil; to scorch
煎り付ける: (いりつける) - to parch; to roast; to broil; to scorch
煎り豆: (いりまめ) - parched or roasted beans (or soybeans)
煎り豆腐: (いりどうふ) - boiled and seasoned tofu
煎る: (いる) - to parch; to fry; to fire; to broil; to roast; to boil down (in oil)
煎れる: (いれる) - to be roasted/to be parched; to be irritated/to be annoyed
煎茶: (sencha) - chá verde, chá de folha verde, chá não em pó (ao contrário do matcha); chá verde de qualidade média
煎茶道: (せんちゃどう) - sencha tea ceremony; Way of Sencha Tea; Chinese-influenced Japanese tea ceremony using leaf tea rather than powdered tea, assoc. with the Ōbaku school of zen
煎豆腐: (いりどうふ) - boiled and seasoned tofu
煎餅: (senbei) - biscoito de arroz, bolacha japonesa, cookie de arroz, wafer
煎餅布団: (せんべいぶとん) - (yoji) thin bedding; hard bed; bedding worn flat and hard by usage
煎餅蒲団: (せんべいぶとん) - (yoji) thin bedding; hard bed; bedding worn flat and hard by usage
煕々: (きき) - spacious; having fun; heavily trafficked
煕煕: (きき) - spacious; having fun; heavily trafficked
煙がる: (けぶがる) - to be sensitive to smoke; to be uncomfortable because of smoke
煙たい: (けぶたい) - smoky; awkward/ill at ease
煙たがる: (けぶたがる) - to be sensitive to smoke; to dislike the company of (someone)/to consider (someone) a burden or nuisance
煙になる: (けむになる) - to go up in smoke; to burn down; to be cremated; to vanish into thin air
煙に巻く: (けむりにまく) - to confuse someone; to befuddle someone; to create a smokescreen
煙る: (けぶる) - to smoke (e.g. fire); to be hazy
煙を吐く: (けむりをはく) - to emit smoke
煙塵: (えんじん) - dust; smokestack smoke; battle scene
煙幕を張る: (えんまくをはる) - to throw up a smoke screen
煙探知器: (えんたんちき) - smoke alarm; smoke detector
煙水晶: (けむりずいしょう) - smoky quartz; cairngorm; morion
煙突: (えんとつ) - chimney/smokestack/funnel (of a ship)/stovepipe; carrying a passenger without turning on the taximeter
煙突効果: (えんとつこうか) - stack effect; chimney effect
煙突掃除夫: (えんとつそうじふ) - chimney sweeper (cleaner)
煙突掃除扶: (えんとつそうじふ) - chimney sweeper (cleaner)
煙筒: (えんとう) - chimney; kiseru/Japanese smoking pipe
煙管: (えんかん) - kiseru/Japanese smoking pipe; fire tube (of a fire-tube boiler); chimney
煙管ボイラー: (えんかんボイラー) - fire-tube boiler
煙管乗り: (キセルのり) - cheating on train fare by buying tickets covering only the first and last portions of the journey
煙管乗車: (キセルじょうしゃ) - cheating on train fare by buying tickets covering only the first and last portions of the journey (so-called because traditional pipes had metal only in two short segments at the ends)
煙草: (tabako) - tobacco, cigarette, cigaret, cigar; tobacco plant (Nicotiana tabacum)
煙草をやめる: (たばこをやめる) - to give up smoking
煙草を吸う: (たばこをすう) - to smoke a cigarette
煙草を止める: (たばこをやめる) - to give up smoking
煙草入れ: (たばこいれ) - tobacco container (esp. a tobacco pouch)
煙警報器: (えんけいほうき) - smoke alarm; smoke sensor
煙雨: (えんう) - misty, fine or drizzling rain
煢独: (けいどく) - orphan; last of kin
煤ける: (すすける) - to be sooty; to be stained
煤塵: (ばいじん) - dust and soot; particulate matter
煤払い: (すすはらい) - cleaning dust etc. from rooms/housecleaning; (the traditional Japanese end-of-the-year, 13th December) big house cleaning/spring cleaning (only not in spring)
煤掃き: (すすはき) - sweeping the soot from one's house (to welcome the kami of the New Year)
